thread.title: Lovely Friendly Hotel ideal for all of Paris attractions
thread.title_full: Lovely Friendly Hotel ideal for all of Paris attractions - Review of Hotel Cervantes by HappyCulture, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Trevor J
title: Lovely Friendly Hotel ideal for all of Paris attractions
text:
Stayed 17th-21st March 2017 - Lovely Friendly Hotel - 15 minutes from most attractions - Clean, Fresh and FREE Coffee (and at their other Happy Culture Hotels) - 2 minutes from Underground - Thoroughly enjoyed the stay
Room Tip: Facing road probably quieter - Trains at back of property - but not sure if they can be heard - We w... See more room tips
